positive.review: game was so great until they removed everything that made it unique and fun it a glorified apex clone atp its not bad it just mid

fun game, deserves more love & less bots 

overall could be a serious competitor to apex, but nobody promotes the game </3
Pretty fun game with friends. Casual and simple to pick up and play.
Great alternative to play Apex while being employed. Like all NetEase games, I'd recommend not to spend money on this game.
Better than Apex Legends. Just wish it was more optimized. Im running a Rtx 5090 and Ryzen 7 9800X3D.

If you are already an Apex Legends player than you no need to figure out the game because the mechanics are almost same and movements are basic. It is fun to play game but currently I believe this game has low player base, so during initial plays you might end up in a bot lobby. 
I play this game because I have low end PC and Apex Legends has gone beyond my PC specifications. Still, I love to play this game.

It's the only battle royal game that is perfectly working for me in Linux using Steam + GE-Proton.
A little blame on developers/admins/algorithms for making me temporarily banned after the first run, but after it there are no issues, I'm able to enjoy this fun game.
Obviously, there are a lot of different things that are not ideal, and this game could not be evaluated as the replacement for PUBG, but it works, you can play with mates and develop your heroes.
Its a good game but the problem is servers are a little bit dead
Great game and very fun to play also a great alternative for apex legends\
i personaly like this game and its way better then fortnite also if your new to this game i recommend it

Because there usually aren't enough players for a full match, it becomes  PvPvE where you can farm bots or gain XP through chests and drops and then face off towards the end. or drop early and fight hot drops

Best Chinese spyware I've downloaded KEK. For real though I love this game unlike a certain other 3 team shooter this game is very optimized my system is old and with FSR I'm getting great FPS unlike on the other game also I love the character design china once again giving gamers what they actually want.

Although a lot of things have changed after its first release, it's good to know that farlight has been a great game with better optimization coming out with each new update, it's only problem or issue would be the fact that it doesn't have a huge player base in some regions, apart from that it's a great hero shooter all around with great mechanics and designs, if i were to rate it based off all the games I've played I'll give it a 4 out of 5

If you are a person looking to just FILL SOME TIME since no other game is fun like it used to be this is a good game for about a week solo or with friends! Yes it's pretty much a copy of apex but no it doesn't have the insane amount of cheaters (low player count) like apex. The community is smaller which means most top players know each other or the teams they go against while in game. I do think that is a pretty cool thing within this game and the movement and gunplay doesn't feel all to awful. 


CONS: 

LOTS of bots in Normal/Ranked

Developers seem to not being showing much effort and show little no to sign of listening to community input even when they are the few that ARE on the game.

Competition is non existent until diamond+

It's had a lot of people complain about it for 2 main reasons. The removal of the jetpack movement and feeling like it's focusing on trying to copy Apex.

Jetpacks were fun, and unique but they were so unbalanced and I understand why they had to go. The removal of vehicles I don't agree with but I hope the devs will bring them back. The game IS fun and the focus now is on heroes with abilities as well as finding "buddies" around the map that do unique things.

I have fun a lot in this game. It's really well made, no bugs, amazing art style and responsive gameplay. I hope people give it a solid try. The more players it gets the better it will be. Don't write it off because people complain it's not the same as release.

The only thing I will moan about is devs please stop focusing on first person! This game was awesome in third person and still is and the skins are so well made! Give third person mode more attention than first please!
Good game, but servers are so shit and laggy, but it's a fun game specially with friends.
great game overall, just dont play it too much otherwise it gets boring quickly (give more skins for my girl ling bo plss)

I played Farlight 84 back in 2023, and itâ€™s great to see how much the game has improved since then. The new movement system with sliding feels smooth and fun, and the map design looks much better now.

It used to run easily even on Intel HD graphics, though now it feels a bit heavier. Still, the gameplay and visuals have improved a lot, and itâ€™s totally worth checking out if you like fast-paced action with cool abilities.

Pros:
-smooth, satisfying movement + gunplay
-nice visuals, clean graphics, good fps on pc
-not super congested with store popups

Cons:
-a lot of bots especially in lower ranks, and anything that isn't ranked is mostly dead/only bots
-rarely find teammates who talk


this is a fun game to jump into every so often, just wish it was more popular

I play a lot of apex and honestly the games combat feels very similar.
-skins are great but nearly impossible to get.(early game tho)
-hit masters and the ranked didnt start feeling like plat on apex until high diamond because there is a lot of bots in the early ranks mixed in with real players.
-lots of great settings customization, prelobby matches, and character abilities
-if there was more players the game would be in a much better state.
-guns feel great and the fidelity is honestly very well done and simplistic.
I love this game's Lobby music <3 The artsyle is what drives me crazy! If only more people knew about this game and gave it a chance...

Farlight 84 is a fast-paced battle royale with unique weapons and vehicles. The futuristic setting and vibrant graphics make each match exciting. Combat is intense and rewards quick thinking and strategy. A fun game for fans of action-packed shooters and chaotic multiplayer battles.
runs smooth, good updates, overall fun game.
it's a nice game but even tho my connection it's stable it kicks me out sometimes saying connection lost while internet working good and it's annoying when i come back im dead on the match
the game is good and more simple version of apex and i love it

It's fun and it seems to have come along way in the last year.  I miss Apex Legends mobile but this is a good alternative.  I don't like that you can't buy skins for your heroes though...I mean it's just cosmetics, why can't we buy the look we want??
Great alternative to apex, enjoyable and fun to play - Games don't feel consistent so always something new - Comp is all round good to play and is rewarding to rankup in
The game would be so good if the dev focus on fix bugs in games. Love everything from this game: quality, animations, heroes are so fun but please...fix the bugs and thank you!
great game; im able to play for hours, it does have it's issues, like any other game.. just wish they'd put in a skin for MK.R as he has none and is the only character in the game without any skins.
The movement mechanics in Farlight 84 make it an easy pick for a chill battle royale shooter.
the game is grate but full of hackers they are doing their best so its fine...
Really good game and has good animated visuals
well, it's pretty good game, considering it being able to playable on low end devices.

i love the animations 
also beginner friendly

completely outstanding game but in need solo mode

Good game I love the feel of the gun, hero's, map. Its got good feel all around.
This game is good , but need more players .

negative.review: Why did they remove the 4v4. I didn't play this game much but it's simple fun and free so some friends played it sometimes.

they remove everything that made the game a game, and the graphics overhaul is awful everything is lagging and crashing even on a high end pc, even cyberpunk can run 60 fps on a potato pc but this game requires an rtx 9090 just to run smooth

At first I didn't get the hate. I was loving this game. Until It started being weird. Dying in two seconds all of a sudden. Hackers? Maybe. Anyway it was a big let down and a waste of time. I will pass and not play it again. It's not fun dying over and over to BS. No thanks. Oh well there's better games out there.

I used to play Farlight 84 a lot, but after the recent updates, the game no longer feels enjoyable. Iâ€™m seriously disappointed with the direction the developers have taken. Many of the features that made the game fun have been removed, and the new changes have only made the overall experience worse. What was once an exciting and engaging game has now become frustrating and difficult to enjoy. I truly hope the developers reconsider their decisions and work to restore the quality the game once had.
Was fun until they did an update that made everyone quit and decided they didnt care about the community at all.
it was fun, i used to play it everyday until they decided to remove and change everything even the jetpack
I open the game. It blacks both my monitor inputs and then just sits on a black screen. Ty china

game might be fun if it didn't conveniently start freezing and hiccuping every time you encountered an enemy.
if you enjoy entering firefights then having your screen suddenly freeze facing an opponent and when it finally releases you you're dead, by all means, play this unoptimized garbage. Otherwise save yourself the rage and skip this title, it isn't worth it.
every single game, BOTS not a single human, the worst copy of apex legends

I used to love this game, but the changes, while full a potential just don't land. The microtransactions are a joke because it forces you to pay to "rent" a skin, which is absolute shite. Abilities are often laughable since they don't do what is advertised in a meaningful way mid-match. Skill based matchmaking is non-existent and the bots are all elite snipers. It's hard to get an enjoyable match with a "just right" challenge because often times, you're pitted against COD League sweats when you do get real players with a bot for a teammate. So much potential, wasted.

cheaters and hackers RUINED this game!
the game was good once, but you will confront the aimbot, wallhacks and ESP hackers nowadays, mostly at mythic+ rank, and no, it's not about skill issue or "GIT GUD" or anything like that, i've seen the hackers myself and can confirm cheating is a Major ISSUE in this game (and alot of other players also can confirm!), if those problems are addressed, then it might become a good game...(even then there are alot of bugs in the game that are not fixed after 3~4 patches and hotfixes...,cause the devs only care about adding cosmetics and $, so i'm skeptical about this game becoming good EVER!) otherwise.... do not risk your mental health for this cheaters fiasco!

Astonishing; no clue how, but this game crashes my whole computer. I am on Linux, but I've never had a game do this before - and it does it reliably. I think it *might* be a good game, but I literally can't tell...

I have played this game ever since it came out. I remember having fun playing it on mobile with amazing optimization. I was the most fun I had in battle royale. Today, I currently own a Stem Deck and I m sick and tired of how the devs handles this game. I tried to give the amount of unneeded changes a pass, because what they added I did liked and didn't mind. I didn't care that it turned to a "Apex clone" no longer being a unique game that it was before, because I can't play Apex Legends. I didn't care about the redesigns, because while I do miss the old ones, I think the new ones are good and love the new characters. But after this update... The controller layouts doesn't work and I had to use a different proton just to play a damn match without it crashing! If there is on thing that I will NEVER give a pass, is that the devs doesn't give a DAMN about optimization! This game went from "Verified" to "Playable" on Steam Deck and to those who owns one, that is a major red flag! And crimson of no controller layouts can function! Not even community layouts can help you! They simply don't understand that if you want people to play the game, then it needs to be playable not just for Steam Deck users, but to everyone! They only want to change the game and add content instead of fixing the main issue that thy refuse to do so for years! Stop giving us stuff that we never asked for and start giving us stuff that we NEED! If you want us to care about this game, then start caring about US!!! This game will die not because we no longer like it, but because you refused to save it! Update: Well I guess most of this review no longer valid, because Lynix players are being banned... Thanks for making me care and now upset even more.

Edit: Way too frustrating, quitting this game for now and only playing on mobile. Please fix

Such a good game. But for unexplainable reasons (or reasons I havent found yet) im having major ping issues during most of my matches. I also play on mobile, and do not have such issues over there. As much as I love this game, I just cant recommend it until I somehow find a fix

You get banned for 24 hours if you try to play on Linux, please fix this

Edit: It's sucks on WIndows too! Especially for controller players it wont work most of the time but aside from the shitty controller support it crash too easily! Today my game crashed twice before even loading into a game but I keep playing it because I genuinly like it please fix

Glitchy mess a port so bad it will make u wonder who actually coded this. The game will be stuck on loading screen on pc, loads after half of the match is already ended and u are somehow still alive oh and its filled with bots so yea u wont even be playing against real people lmao. anyways dead game, shitty optimization, map is too big for the players it allows each map so even finding a bot ingame after u by some miracle load in will be hard. Avoid this. play something else do not waste your storage and your money

Horrible company and horrible game, they removed the jetpacks, the fun, and now they removed all Linux users like me due to that stupid anticheat. I'm done with this game, you never get enough from messing up with your own players.

If you are a mouse and keyboard player, don't play this game unless you have friends that do.
Aim assist everywhere, it even snaps on to my ass cheeks and can snap to my glory hole.
Just play apex, at least you have movement to counter aim assist there, in here the slides/slide jump is so slow that the enemy aim assist can easily snap on to your character while you are sliding.
You used to have a good counter for aim assist back then with the jetpack dashes on every champion. Now they removed it, they also removed crossplay on android also but can crossplay with controller players.
The game is region locked for me and I'm no long able to play please fix
Just listen to the community bro you're getting less players now
game doesnt wanna log in, stuck on the loading
Wouldn't want to play this even if i was paid.., wait i can't. They ban you for using the Steamdeck.
SO FKING SERVER DOWN , AND THE COMPENSATION JUST 100 COIN? IDIOT !
It used to be good now its broken unplayable with high ping and no players to play against dont waste your time but if you like to play against bots go ahead

i dont understand how you match me with 60 people and im in a solo squad, IN RANKED. and i dont get any type of advantage from it.

Original game was cool, but now it just feels like this game is trying to be everything but what it originally was supposed to be. Im glad they updated the graphics but this game just doesnt hit the same anymore.
One the worst Updates ever, game crashes are so frequent like once a match
I have tried everything I know and still cant make the controller to work. I'm using my steamdeck. I hope you fix this soon.
I wonder what's the point of copying shits......
just play apex, this is an inferior clone in every way
love it when the game freezes halfway through.
WE TRULY WANT THE OLD VERSION IM LITTRLY BEGGIN YOU !

just copied the map from apex legends hahahahahaha
No linux, no love.

Got banned for 24 hours for no apparent reason; asked support what the reason was:

"We've verified that account REDACTED has been penalized due to an environmental anomaly. Please check your device environment and avoid using virtual machine software, such as Linux or emulators. Once you've verified that your device environment is functioning correctly, you can try repairing the game client/uninstalling and reinstalling it. If you continue to have issues, please feel free to contact us with more detailed information for further investigation (e.g., the problematic video, specific device model, and platform)."

I.e., they ban you for using "virtual machine software" such as Linux.

Edit: 17.09.2025 - To clarify, the game was fully playable on Linux before the most recent patch as of this edit, the developers did not mention that Linux would all of the sudden not be supported (at least not in game).
I loved this game until they decided to block all the linux players with this useless anticheat

[h1] NOT EVERYONE THAT USES LINUX ARE HACKING/CHEATING!!! [/h1]
Fun game but devs decided to cut half their player base by silently pushing a update to ban Linux users, and yet this game still steam deck verified????

Despite launching and initially running just fine on Linux (CachyOS), the game BANS Linux players immediately after their first match for 24 hours. Customer support states that only Windows is officially supported. Horribly anti-consumer practices, banning users for no reason other than what operating system they choose to use.

The privacy policy for this game is horrendous!!  After reading it, I immediately clicked Decline and uninstalled it.  They, basically, say they take your privacy seriously, then go on to describe how they won't use your personal data unless you tell them they can, or it's allowed by law.  The sheer amount of data they can share and use is crazy.  

In addition, I've read that this game's Anti-Cheat system bans players for 24hrs just for using Linux to play it.  So, to me, this company sounds very sketchy, and I'm just going to take a pass on this game, even though it looks like it might be fun.
I loved the game until they secretly  went and banned us its fine tho more space for my deck the devs will regret this.
you guys ruined farlight. it is now completely unplayable on my device. i used to be able to reach 100 fps back on the old ui. now i barely reach 30. i hope you guys delete this game.
yall removed the jetpack movements and it killed the game. now yall r trying to bring it back. it's the sole uniqueness why people play it and u decide for NO reason to remove it.

I LOVED this game until it became like 70% bots (and this is in mythic/legend lobbies). Game's not enjoyable shooting people who LITERALLY CANNOT KILL ME they miss everything, it's not even like the bots are average or anything. I was streaming and making content but the way the games changed it's just not enjoyable. Went from a 9/10 - a 4/10 based purely off the bots.

Game is super fun and engaging but controller aim assist is so over tuned it is basically aim bot. At lower levels of play it doesn't matter as much, but at higher levels you just get mowed down in .25 seconds by a controller 3 stack for peeking for a millisecond or making the mistake of initiating an engagement. You are literally putting yourself at a disadvantage by not playing on a controller. This game is super fun. I would love to give it a thumbs up, and I think you should try this game, but until that gets nerfed I will be giving it a thumbs down. Very fun but fuck the controller aim assist.
it was fun for the little i was able to play, but they recently put out a patch that auto bans linux users. gg's.
game is good but get banned coz play on linux, no support at all .tnx for the developers

I just logged on through linux and now i'm banned. 
Played for 2h tops on my boyfriends pc which is windows, tried booting it on our shared PC (which has linux) only to find out I got banned. Very sad. Never once been banned in a videogame. 
0/10 can't recommend.

Edit: Apparently it is in the ToS to not use virtual enviroments, I'm not technical enough to realize that includes Linux. My bad I guess. I still think the ban is unnecessary, they could have issued a warning and prevent launching the game instead.
Fun game, but they ban you for using Linux. Devs please allow Linux users to play

Great game concept, its mostly fun, my issues with it is that every game feels like you have braindead teammates or bots and most enemies are bots so there is no competition or very little in a match, coming from a now legend player.

feeling like every game is just a bot bash is pretty boring but I do like the game itself. 

also most teammates quit the game after just going down cause there is no punishment so most random teammates are just bots that leave matches.
it was great until recent updates. Now the devs intentionally ban steam deck/linux players for not using windows.

laying off for now. ranked matchmaking is beyond repair (at least in my opinion). occasional cheaters (ESP/Aimbot) in at least 2/5 matches in a day for me. ALSO, whoever made this game and thought it was a good idea to automatically quit mid-match once you click OK after pressing ESC key (i don't know, to check SETTINGS?), ur an idiot. goodbye rank -100 points
Too many Microtransaction!!! Brought a player cant even use it once new season started, The game is so cluttered in the main menu.

Game literally wouldn't even load. It's just another trashy battle royale mobile game so poorly ported to PC that the game just won't load. I stood by on the starting loading screen for 10 minutes to see if I could even play and nothing
look the gameplay is fun, but i am done seeing half the roster not be playable because of constant reworks. and they just released a NEW character while reworking 6 others like what?

If they spent half as much time monitoring players as they do creating micro transactions the game would be pretty good. Also added note, the fact that if you hit left and right over and over again your hit boxes are non existing.
Every update is a new game, like new view new setting new sensitivity etc. over for me. Game when from best to worst.
The graphics went too high, and can't be played unlike before, not sure if anyone feels the same like me, but I miss the old one.
I loaded the game up, didn't mean to press the fight button, i close the game down while i was in queue, and now I'm banned for a day. Great experience so far.

I used to love this game, but the changes, while full a potential just don't land. The microtransactions are a joke because it forces you to pay to "rent" a skin, which is absolute shite. Abilities are often laughable since they don't do what is advertised in a meaningful way mid-match. Skill based matchmaking is non-existent and the bots are all elite snipers. It's hard to get an enjoyable match with a "just right" challenge because often times, you're pitted against COD League sweats when you do get real players with a bot for a teammate. So much potential, wasted.

cheaters and hackers RUINED this game!
the game was good once, but you will confront the aimbot, wallhacks and ESP hackers nowadays, mostly at mythic+ rank, and no, it's not about skill issue or "GIT GUD" or anything like that, i've seen the hackers myself and can confirm cheating is a Major ISSUE in this game (and alot of other players also can confirm!), if those problems are addressed, then it might become a good game...(even then there are alot of bugs in the game that are not fixed after 3~4 patches and hotfixes...,cause the devs only care about adding cosmetics and $, so i'm skeptical about this game becoming good EVER!) otherwise.... do not risk your mental health for this cheaters fiasco!

Astonishing; no clue how, but this game crashes my whole computer. I am on Linux, but I've never had a game do this before - and it does it reliably. I think it *might* be a good game, but I literally can't tell...

I have played this game ever since it came out. I remember having fun playing it on mobile with amazing optimization. I was the most fun I had in battle royale. Today, I currently own a Stem Deck and I m sick and tired of how the devs handles this game. I tried to give the amount of unneeded changes a pass, because what they added I did liked and didn't mind. I didn't care that it turned to a "Apex clone" no longer being a unique game that it was before, because I can't play Apex Legends. I didn't care about the redesigns, because while I do miss the old ones, I think the new ones are good and love the new characters. But after this update... The controller layouts doesn't work and I had to use a different proton just to play a damn match without it crashing! If there is on thing that I will NEVER give a pass, is that the devs doesn't give a DAMN about optimization! This game went from "Verified" to "Playable" on Steam Deck and to those who owns one, that is a major red flag! And crimson of no controller layouts can function! Not even community layouts can help you! They simply don't understand that if you want people to play the game, then it needs to be playable not just for Steam Deck users, but to everyone! They only want to change the game and add content instead of fixing the main issue that thy refuse to do so for years! Stop giving us stuff that we never asked for and start giving us stuff that we NEED! If you want us to care about this game, then start caring about US!!! This game will die not because we no longer like it, but because you refused to save it! Update: Well I guess most of this review no longer valid, because Lynix players are being banned... Thanks for making me care and now upset even more.

Edit: Way too frustrating, quitting this game for now and only playing on mobile. Please fix
